description: Great for online study, if you need to copy down a lot of text, just take a picture ;) This tool will copy it from your clipboards screenshot!
This little program is a real winner! I've been at a real loss because I just cannot get my scanner to work. THEN I found this. Thank you for creating this.

Upgraded to Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS very recently. I installed this little program again but it does not do any OCR, the reason why it was so incredibly useful. During installation, this displayed: runtime org.gnome.Platform branch 41 is end-of-life, with reason:
  The GNOME 41 runtime is no longer supported as of September 17, 2022. Please ask your application developer to migrate to a supported platform.
summary: I loved this app, no OCR now

description: No problem at all, really fast, ubuntu 22.04

Thanks to this app I'm able to mine sentences quite efficiently. Now it may not be exactly as efficient as game2text as it doesn't automatically generate the text. TextSnatcher is quite accurate, if the background of a game isn't too crazy I can rely on this program to give me a pretty accurate reading. Also it's insanely simple making sentence mining a little less of a hassle.
Does what it says on the Tin, would be nice if it showed the text in the window as well as copying to clipboard

So far so good, but I had to go to for a tutorial.
https://youtu.be/sAACv-QqXSU

Thank you for this app it has potential.
summary: Takes a bit to figure it out but it works

description:
Interaction with system snapping tool feels a bit clunky (Ubuntu 21.10, Gnome). An image is saved in the home directory each time which is a bit annoying.

Letting this apart, this tool works really well.
